text.name: Third Eye
text.description:
{Third Eye}

Gives heroes a chance to learn 5th level spells cast by enemy spellcasters in battles and decreases amount of enemy's creatures available spells by 1.
text.event: An old woman, seemingly some hag living in hermitage, is screaming at you right after you meet her, possibly due to her lack of sight. After a while of her effing and blinding, she suddenly hands you some sort of a golden bust and disappears in thin air.
